name: Dr. Diane Hamilton
tag_list: dr--diane-hamilton, self-help-expert, online-expert, online-education, personality-assessment, career, reinvent-your-career, understanding-personalities, young-adult, online-learning
overview:
DrDianeHamilton.com is the main website for Dr. Diane Hamilton. Dr. Hamilton is a professor, online expert and self-help author of the following books: The Online Student’s User Manual; How to Reinvent Your Career; and The Young Adult’s Guide to Understanding Personalities.

She has a Doctorate Degree in Business Management and currently teach bachelor-, master-, and doctoral-level courses for six online universities. Along with her teaching and writing experience, she has more than twenty-five years of business- and management-related experience. Her background includes work in many industries, including computers, software, pharmaceuticals, corporate training, mortgage/lending, and real estate. She is passionate about helping people reach their lifetime potential.
